entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
